ApiKey.description: An Otoroshi Api Key. An Api Key is defined for a group of services to allow usage of the same Api Key for multiple services.

authorizedEntities.description: The group/service ids (prefixed by group_ or service_ on which the key is authorized

clientId.description: The unique id of the Api Key. Usually 16 random alpha numerical characters, but can be anything

clientName.description: The name of the api key, for humans ;-)

clientSecret.description: The secret of the Api Key. Usually 64 random alpha numerical characters, but can be anything

dailyQuota.description: Authorized number of calls per day

enabled.description: Whether or not the key is enabled. If disabled, resources won't be available to calls using this key

metadata.description: Bunch of metadata for the key

monthlyQuota.description: Authorized number of calls per month

throttlingQuota.description: Authorized number of calls per second, measured on 10 seconds

$block: An Otoroshi Api Key. An Api Key is defined for a group of services to allow usage of the same Api Key for multiple services.

$ul: **authorizedEntities**: The group/service ids (prefixed by group_ or service_ on which the key is authorized
**clientId**: The unique id of the Api Key. Usually 16 random alpha numerical characters, but can be anything
**clientName**: The name of the api key, for humans ;-)
**clientSecret**: The secret of the Api Key. Usually 64 random alpha numerical characters, but can be anything
**dailyQuota**: Authorized number of calls per day
**enabled**: Whether or not the key is enabled. If disabled, resources won't be available to calls using this key
**metadata**: Bunch of metadata for the key
**monthlyQuota**: Authorized number of calls per month
**throttlingQuota**: Authorized number of calls per second, measured on 10 seconds
